title: I don't want to play League anymore.
body:
I've been playing since season 3. Bought tons of skins, own almost all the champions, but I just can't bring myself to play anymore.

----
http://i64.tinypic.com/x3s5s5.jpg[/IMG]

It's just too perfect.

replies.body: Sypher has reached 0 rp and IP, Sypher is a free elf!
Because Socks are so 2015 :^)

1993*

ftfy
Damn! if only you had reached challenger one when you had done this, then you would have completely beaten the game. . . .
I mean, they still did hit end credits, but they won't ever get to see the true ending.
I hit 69 rp, but I want the new Kindred skin so damn bad.

> [{quoted}](name=SummonersFowl,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=M8EFF8Kl,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-27T11:19:27.040+0000)
>
> I hit 69 rp, but I want the new Kindred skin so damn bad.

I was all like no more money for you rito.. rito releases super galaxy skins
Me: FUUUUUUUUUUUUUU
This is why riot allows you to smurf. Just in case you conquer the game.

"Allows you to smurf"

HA
YOu're welcomed to transfer your account to me if you wish and start over. :D
Now you have to get Mastery level 7 on every champion.
Rito give this guy one of each
In before riot gives you 3 RP.
I'd laugh if Riot gave you one RP.
I might cry a bit if they do that. Is it even possible to spend just 1 RP?
Nothing that I know of costs 1 RP. >:D

> [{quoted}](name=SypherTheExile,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=M8EFF8Kl,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2016-05-27T22:59:27.288+0000)

uhm is actually quite hard to get rid of that Rp....just get more skins xD

All these champions freed Sypher!
stop while you can !
